title: Luiz Ribas
bio: Specialist Architect in Open Transformation, I help clients create perfectly transformational architectures, preparing their teams of developers, architects, and businesses, to develop excellent applications based on the latest technologies and cultural concepts such as DevOps, Agile and among others, with a focus on execution of practices to create a resilient environment with multifunctional teams, boosting the evolution process of individuals and the delivery of proposed solutions during the journey.
